Exclusive Hantec trading professional Trading Offer

Hantec market participant, based in MU, was established in December 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering three program types: 1 Step, Instant, and 2 Steps, and it supports the MT5 and MT4 trading platforms. Hantec market participant has a review score of 4.6 out of 5 based on 21 reviews. certified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
